ygData.subject: How Lullaby used to be.
ygData.msgSnippet: I was roaming around the net and I found these old pictures Sylly took.  I have some of my own, but these show the outside perspective.
ygData.messageBody:
I was roaming around the net and I found these old pictures Sylly
took. I have some of my own, but these show the outside perspective.

http://www.grandnet.com/users/jow/ACF2AD.jpg
http://www.grandnet.com/users/jow/ACF2B0.jpg
http://www.grandnet.com/users/jow/bbtrain.jpg
http://www.grandnet.com/users/jow/bbtrain2.jpg

I think I was L19 in these pictures. Full bronze which I worked
my ass of for from the first wave of L50s on Innoruuk. This is
when a bronze bp would run about 75-100pp.

I put over 20 gnolls to sleep, ranging from scrawny to elite.
I lost maybe 2 or 3 bubbles of health for the 2 or 3 mins I stood
there holding them still. That's right, completely still. Hardly
anything attacked me, they stayed asleep until I stopped playing.

This is how it used to be. Verant (and GZ) blatantly lied that
they haven't adjusted this song since release. I tried to sleep
off a few skeletons yesterday and I could not keep the group
controlled at all. The programmers didn't just put in the failed
to mesmerize message, about 4 or 5 months ago they definitely F'd
this song.

Harmonic.
